mapper.select: select s.p_name as p_name ,c.c_img as c_img ,c.c_price as c_price, c.c_amount as c_amount, c.p_idx as p_idx, c.user_num as user_num, c.c_idx as c_idx from Store s join Cart c on s.p_idx = c.p_idx where user_num = #{user_num} order by c.c_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into Cart(c_img, c_price, c_amount, p_idx, user_num) values(#{c_img} , #{c_price}, #{c_amount}, #{p_idx}, #{user_num})
